title: Captain Fortune splash
body:
Greetings, just wanted to know who is the artist behind the Captain Fortune splash art and will there be a larger version of it available sometime soon? Fantastic work done by the artist!
Have a nice day \o/

replies.body: maybe Jason Chan did this? (just a thought   = 3 = )  [He did the {{champion:51}}  and {{champion:104}}  splash too](http://www.jasonchanart.com/#/lol/)

> [{quoted}](name=iceilis,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EWFZ8M4x,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-07-09T19:35:10.833+0000)
>
> maybe Jason Chan did this? (just a thought   = 3 = )  [He did the {{champion:51}}  and {{champion:104}}  splash too](http://www.jasonchanart.com/#/lol/)

Right on the money!  You have a good eye.
Hearty compliments to Jason Chan.  Superb work and much appreciated.
Thank you!
This is, without a doubt, my favorite splash art in the game. I've been following it internally for a while now, and as a MF player, I'm so happy with the final result.
I feel like it's the same artist who updated Caitlyn's splash, but don't know who that is either.
This splash art and the skin look truly amazing! So good work from you guys, and Jason Chan truly killed this splash, it's my favourite too now!

Her face, amazingly done!
Reminds me of Pippi Longstocking :)
I like more her boobs, but hey his face is ok as well.
I envy your refined taste and exceptionally cultivated manner of conveying it.

boobs! boobs! hoo hoo hoo

*pounds chest*

I absolutely love this skin.

I have a hard time taking Miss Fortune seriously. She's walking fanservice, and talks like a porn star "acting" like a pirate. This skin doesn't fix her voice, but, to me at least, it's much cooler AND sexier. This is a lady I can imagine seducing sailors, tricking them into joining her crew or otherwise using her wiles to dethrone captains and cheat them out of their hard earned gold, and kill them in their quarters.

"Walking fanservice" is not accurate. MF was created with the idea of giving the league a deliberately over-the-top slutty character that screams camp and silliness. Fanservice refers to something a bit more implied, like Katarina's bouncing breasts in the cinematics and her midriff tattoo. Miss Fortune's skankyness is at least 50% humor.

That makes it even worse.

How am I supposed to take a character seriously when 50% of that character's aestehtics  is supposed to be a flat joke?

It is out-of-place fanservice that may look good at first glance, but only a few moments later you can only shake your head about how stupid it is.
Do you know how many league characters are about 50% joke?
{{champion:35}}  100% or more >:D

Gotta love this community. This inability to differnciate with humerous use of of steroetypes and cliches and a simple unfunny fanservice fail. It's amazing. Why are you guys even allowed to pos ton these boards? It really puzzles me...
Can't tell if your saying the guy you're replying to is what you say, or if you're implying that the guy before the guy you're replying to is. make your insults more clear dammit.

{{champion:53}} Adorably emotionless robot
{{champion:36}} Muuundo
{{champion:79}} Walking fat joke
{{champion:74}} The dong
{{champion:33}} Ok
{{champion:80}} Overly manly
{{champion:44}} Outrageous
{{champion:45}} Evil midget

Just a few of the characters who are also joke-ish.

{{champion:85}} ninja hamster
{{champion:42}} flying hamster
{{champion:17}} hamster satan
She'll make your cannon rise and then shoot her guns before your cannon get loaded. Bounty hunter and booty hunter in one go. (my this post probably should get censored i guess LOL) <.>
http://i.imgur.com/1N7OJBf.jpg

MF becoming a captain?


>We must struggle to not become what we hate.

http://pre00.deviantart.net/7154/th/pre/f/2012/092/a/b/thane_krios_13_by_johntesh-d4usrzm.jpg
RIP Krios, you magnificent, leather-wearing, psychic assassin.
its absolutely gorgeous :')
Should've been her default appearance.

That skin should have been her VU. Including the splashart.

THIS is what Sarah Fortune, leader and bounty hunter, pirate hunter and one of the most political figures of Bilgewater is supposed to be. Not that weird fuck up of broken anatomy and out-of-place sexualisation.

Now, don't call me a feminazi or whatever and blame me for hating hot female champions. I mean... just LOOK AT THIS SPLASHART. She looks even hotter than in the current classic one, mostly BECAUSE she's serious and badass and this. And I finally can take her serious as a character, which is by far one of the most important things.

Don't make this a skin, make this her default appearance.

While Zeronis did the final concept, I pitched the idea for this one (and hovered over him the whole time) for this exact reason. MF is my favourite ADC and jumped at the opportunity to have a skin to play that leaned more on her 'serious business' side. Jason Chan and the whole splash team really went above and beyond on this one; there were a number of revisions to her face/hair etc. to get it feeling just right.

"LOOK AT THIS SPLASHART. She looks even hotter than in the current classic one, mostly BECAUSE she's serious and badass and this."
Agreed 100%! I think they just didn't make this as her VU cause they've stepped away from the old "traditional skin" concept. Maybe this is why they posted that thing earlier too about why they're stepping away from the idea of traditional skin. The only thing i'd hate about not having this as her base skin is that the ingame icon will still be that lame old base splash art. This new one deserves to be used in game.
This is one of my favorite splash arts... EVER!
I swear Riot always surprise me with their splasharts and visual updates :D

I would pay Riot to redo Heartseeker Ashe using the artists for this skin. They put too much makeup on her and made her seem very awkward, as opposed to Miss Fortune here who manages to look gorgeous and dangerous at the same time without being a Valentine's Day skin.

10/10 Well done.

Heartseeker Ashe is meant to be kind of the way it is though, that's like someone "trying" to look beautiful. Where as here in Captain Fortune's case, she's not trying that, so there's no make up. But i have to agree with you about the face though, Captain Fortune's face has to be the most gorgeous face in any of the splashes Riot has made so far.

Wow. I got down voted for that comment.

I can understand the need to TRY for a Valentine Day's skin, but I am a girl. I put on makeup too. And that was a poor execution of "overdone" makeup in the splash.

I've been working on a Heartseeker Ashe cosplay and comparing the model and splash has shown me just how bad the splash was made.

There are so many differences in colors and shapes of different things.

At least Ashe's face isn't caked up and too extreme in color in the game model. But her hair is completely different colors in the splash and in game. In splash, its baby pink. In game, its a white with light blue tints.

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TuuOerq_NI0/UvKH9QwKs2I/AAAAAAAAL14/ruTdBDLxdPE/s1600/Ashe_6.jpg

We should really vote to make this the classic Fortune skin. Its too close to her original but its so much better.

Chiming in to say that I think I can explain that; Ashe has white hair (of course). White reflects light like no other and is dramatically impacted by hues around it. Her hair in her splash is actually reflecting the colors of her chair and outfit (you can see the violet, pinks, and slight golds). As for her model -- in the art world, white hair as a standalone is commonly shaded with blue to give it depth, since shading it with gray would make it flat and dimensionless. Since Ashe's model is obviously not the static  2D splash, and league has no dramatic lighting engine, it wouldn't be able to have the colors you see in the artwork. O:

> [{quoted}](name=xArchangel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EWFZ8M4x,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2015-07-10T20:36:29.116+0000)
>
> Wow. I got down voted for that comment.
> 
> I can understand the need to TRY for a Valentine Day's skin, but I am a girl. I put on makeup too. And that was a poor execution of "overdone" makeup in the splash.
> 
> I've been working on a Heartseeker Ashe cosplay and comparing the model and splash has shown me just how bad the splash was made.
> 
> There are so many differences in colors and shapes of different things.
> 
> At least Ashe's face isn't caked up and too extreme in color in the game model. But her hair is completely different colors in the splash and in game. In splash, its baby pink. In game, its a white with light blue tints.
> 
> http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TuuOerq_NI0/UvKH9QwKs2I/AAAAAAAAL14/ruTdBDLxdPE/s1600/Ashe_6.jpg
> 
> We should really vote to make this the classic Fortune skin. Its too close to her original but its so much better.

I'll agree with that, it's heavily over the top. But again, i think that's what the artist was going for. And i'm not the one who downvoted your comment but i'll upvote it to neutralise whoever did it LOL.
Good luck with your cosplay! 
And i don't think they'll be replacing the main splash, i just hope they rework that one too to give her more of look of someone who lures to kill rather than just stands awkwardly to uh, kinda "expose" herself.
Jason Chan also did {{champion:107}} 's splash, and IMO, it's great.

Though I am annoyed to see the usual censorship/objectification demographic off-topically crowing about Sarah's default skin...

..this Splash is flat-out gorgeous. I disagree with it being her 'default' mind you - she's a bounty hunter by default, one who it is confirmed uses sex appeal as a weapon - "make em think with their guns and they'll forget their pistols" - and that works. Plus her new model looks a little more plausible (and a ton better than the old) - but this is her in the future perhaps. A somewhat older, more settled, more powerful figure - not *Miss* FOrtune but *Captain* Fortune. And the model isn't quite as good as the splash in this case.

THat said, this splash is gorgeous and its a bold, fitting reinterpretation of the character. For those who argue they can't take Sarah seriously as she is now - you judgmental slut-shamers! - here's an option for you. Doesn't mean she needs to lose her other just because it offends your petty sensibilities.

Well said Sir/Ma'am, very well said. If you look at that way, it makes sense as to why this splash would not go with her original title of the "bounty hunter". I still think they should change her base splash art, probably the viewing angle too.

Like this is the first splash that tells a story to me. The (unofficial) fight between her and GP, taking over her ship, the struggle to gaining control of a ship, and the amount of work she may have put to gain a loyal following on bandits is what I see just from this splash.

The maturity she gained as opposed to her original previous splash, the look of stern leadership.
All I can say is DAMN this is sweet.
amazing
I don't think her proportions are correct, she's lacking the umph of her model.

> [{quoted}](name=Immortal Strife,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EWFZ8M4x,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-09T14:33:52.029+0000)
>
> I don't think her proportions are correct, she's lacking the umph of her model.

I think that's the corset at work. Those laces look tight ;)
Should be her main splash, and not just for the skin.
I love her two big.. uhhh... pistols.

To the person who design this splash art u have some seriously exceptional talent. Keep up the good work,also do u think u can do an updated silent night sona and candy cane mf splash art thank you. When can we get a 1920x1080 version of this splash art?
this one was going to the the MF rework i think.
I agree. Beautiful artwork! Hope the skin is up to par in game
